Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel in Mataró”
Reviews.Author: JOSPIR89
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel times 4 reasons located 40 barcelona car hotel clean comfortable size buffet breakfast limited evening meals bar individually cooked staff friendly don´t worry parking car available streets nearby avoid summer duplex fourth floor hot

Reviews.Title: “Quality hotel”
Reviews.Author: DavidLKnight
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel nights october 2011 located 10 mins train station regular trains centre barcelona hotel clean comfortable size buffet breakfast limited evening meals bar individually cooked staff friendly helpful ideas days barcelona reported battery safe changed whilst ate breakfast house garage reasonable cost free street parking

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel. Out of Town. Best Option in Mataro.”
Reviews.Author: podettski
Reviews.Content: stayed week staff couldnt nicer cleaned daily september else hotel including pool weekends restaurant closed free wifi lobby wifi chargeable hotel town 15 min walk train station main didnt nicer hotel 15 min walk biggest beach town quiet sleep

Reviews.Title: “45 minutes of train. Unfriendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: Lila2008
Reviews.Content: hotel train station 10 minutes walk 45 minutes train center barcelona train catalunya recommend closer staff unfriendly helpful difference bunch questions restaurant etc

Reviews.Title: “decent hotel do not arrive hungry at weekends”
Reviews.Author: plantpage
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel ten hour drive paris sunday tired hungry delighted despite mention hotel website food available weekend cup coffee beer chap hotel reception offered phone pizza agreed mistake absolutely disgusting sewage smell upstairs corridors shame ok breakfast following morning ok unfortunately couldnt total lack service arrival previous night hotel door goodness sake

Reviews.Title: “Good standard”
Reviews.Author: ambassadorger
Reviews.Content: hotel location people business travel located centre reach hotel quickly car coming near dual carriage walk beach 10 minutes pleasant intend cold beer numerous restaurants bars sea hotel pool gym allows fit travels enjoyed short stay thanks

HotelInfo.Name: NH Ciutat de Mataro
HotelInfo.Address: Cami Ral, 648 | Mataro, 08302 Barcelona, Spain
